Control Name: 2.10.2 Application configuration information is stored using a dedicated management system such as Azure App Configuration or Azure Key Vault
Control Statement: Where is application configuration information stored and how does the application access it?

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 2.10 How are you managing the configuration of your workload?
